sentence: Reflecting Biden's currently dimmed political star, one important Democrat from Pennsylvania, state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, pointedly kept away from the presidential visit, citing a scheduling conflict.
title: Biden Visits Collapsed Bridge, Touts Infrastructure Law
